title: Decreases the prohibited area of parking around a fire hydrant from fifteen to ten feet
summary: Decreases the prohibited area of parking around a fire hydrant from fifteen to ten feet to reduce parking congestion in heavily populated areas.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3062

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 21, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. PRETLOW, BUTLER, WRIGHT -- read once and referred
         to the Committee on Transportation

       AN  ACT  to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to decreasing
         the prohibited distance of parking near a fire hydrant

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph 1 of subdivision (b) of section 1202 of the vehi-
    2  cle  and  traffic law, as amended by chapter 574 of the laws of 2006, is
    3  amended to read as follows:
    4    1. No person shall stop, stand or park a vehicle within [fifteen]  TEN
    5  feet  of  a  fire  hydrant  except  when  such  vehicle is attended by a
    6  licensed operator or chauffeur who is seated in the front seat  and  who
    7  can immediately move such vehicle in case of emergency, unless a differ-
    8  ent distance is indicated by official signs, markings or parking meters.
    9    S  2.   This act shall take effect on the thirtieth day after it shall
   10  have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02816-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to decreasing the prohibited distance of parking near a fire hydrant
